_header: There been women there been words
_description: Proverbial saying against women, translating Multi sermones ibi sunt vbi sunt mulieres / Ac vbi sunt auce merde sunt non in pauce — one couplet

BodDou52.Transcription:
There ben women there ben wordisThere ben gese there ben
                    tordys
BodDou52.Editions:
Förster,  Max. 
             “Die Mittelenglische Sprichwörtersammlung in Douce 52.” 
             Festschrift zum XII Deutschen Neuphilolgentage in München
                1906.
            E. Stollreither, ed. 
         Erlangen (1906): 40-64: 50.

RylandsLat394.Transcription:
Ther ben women þer ben wordisTher ben gese ther ben
                    toordes
RylandsLat394.Editions:
Pantin,  William A. 
             “A Medieval Collection of Latin and English Proverbs…from Rylands
                Latin MS. 394.” 
             Bulletin of the John Rylands Library
         14 (1930): 81-114: 100.
